Rank.Description: Decreases the cast time of your Crystalline Missiles spell by 0.1 second, its mana cost by 6% and causes Crystalline Missiles and Volcanic Eruption to increase your pet's damage by 2% for 10 seconds.

Decreases the cast time of your Crystalline Missiles spell by 0.2 seconds, its mana cost by 12% and causes Crystalline Missiles and Volcanic Eruption to increase your pet's damage by 4% for 10 seconds.

Decreases the cast time of your Crystalline Missiles spell by 0.3 seconds, its mana cost by 18% and causes Crystalline Missiles and Volcanic Eruption to increase your pet's damage by 6% for 10 seconds.

Decreases the cast time of your Crystalline Missiles spell by 0.4 seconds, its mana cost by 24% and causes Crystalline Missiles and Volcanic Eruption to increase your pet's damage by 8% for 10 seconds.

Decreases the cast time of your Crystalline Missiles spell by 0.5 seconds, its mana cost by 30% and causes Crystalline Missiles and Volcanic Eruption to increase your pet's damage by 10% for 10 seconds.

Ability.Description: Increases Armor by 99. Reduces damage done to the Mage's pet by 5%. Lasts 1h. Counts as a Mage Armor.

Your Ignite increases the critical hit chance of your pets abilities by 30%.

Ability.Description: Knocks back up to 3 enemies in front of the Mage. Snares each enemy for 6s.

Casting a damaging Earth spell increases the damage of your next Air spell, within 10 seconds, by 7%.
Casting a damaging Earth spell increases the damage of your next Air spell, within 10 seconds, by 15%.
Increases your pets’ damage by 6% Your Air Elemental's Electrify increases your spell power by an additional 1%. Your Earth Elemental’s Thud reduces damage dealt to the Elemental by 2% for 5 seconds.

Increases your pets’ damage by 12% Your Air Elemental's Electrify increases your spell power by an additional 2%. Your Earth Elemental’s Thud reduces damage dealt to the Elemental by 4% for 5 seconds.

Increases your pets’ damage by 18% Your Air Elemental's Electrify increases your spell power by an additional 3%. Your Earth Elemental’s Thud reduces damage dealt to the Elemental by 6% for 5 seconds.

Increases your pets’ damage by 24% Your Air Elemental's Electrify increases your spell power by an additional 4%. Your Earth Elemental’s Thud reduces damage dealt to the Elemental by 8% for 5 seconds.

Increases your pets’ damage by 30% Your Air Elemental's Electrify increases your spell power by an additional 5%. Your Earth Elemental’s Thud reduces damage dealt to the Elemental by 10% for 5 seconds.

Ability.Description: Causes damaging abilities to restore 3 Charge to the Mage. Lasts 1h.

Rank.Description: Casting a damaging Fire spell increases the damage of your next Earth spell, within 10 seconds, by 7%.
Casting a damaging Fire spell increases the damage of your next Earth spell, within 10 seconds, by 15%.

Ability.Description: Increases damage done by 100%. Increases the Mage's elemental damage done by 50%. Lasts 15s.
Summons a Greater Air Elemental (max level 27). Best used for Damage.
Summons a Greater Earth Elemental (max level 27). Best used for Tanking.

Rank.Description: Grants you the ability to summon Greater Air and Earth Elementals. Reduces area effect damage done to your Elemental pets by 65%, plus an additional 1% for every point spent in the Elementalist soul above 21, to a maximum of 95%.

Ability.Description: Deals 406 Water damage over 8s. Deals 966 to 1068 Water damage and removes Icy Carapace if the enemy is hit by Air damage from the Mage.

Rank.Description: You and your pet's attacks ignore 2% of your target's Armor and Resistances.
You and your pet's attacks ignore 4% of your target's Armor and Resistances.
Casting a damaging Air spell increases the damage of your next Water spell, within 10 seconds, by 7%.
Casting a damaging Air spell increases the damage of your next Water spell, within 10 seconds, by 15%.

Reduces the cast time of Stormbolt by 100%.

Reduces your pet's global cooldown to 1 second.

Rank.Description: Casting a damaging Water spell increases the damage of your next Fire spell, within 10 seconds, by 7%.

Ability.Description: Deals 360 to 398 Air, Earth, Fire and Water damage.
